New Records: Heinrich Klaasen scored the fastest fifty in a T20 World Cup final (23 balls)
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah bowled a spectacular final over to take the wicket of Marco Jansen and restrict South Africa to 169/8, securing a 7-run victory for India
Post-Match Reflections: India players and fans celebrated their victory, ending a 13-year wait for a World Cup title
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Barbados, with India scoring the most runs in a World Cup final (176/7)
Others: Suryakumar Yadav took a spectacular catch along the ropes to dismiss David Miller, sealing India's victory
